summary: this may just be my inner demon talking but judging based on the way dnp are behaving now,,,all the things they're doing,,all...
body: this may just be my inner demon talking but judging based on the way dnp are behaving now,,,all the things they’re doing,,all the things they’re saying,,, it’s not hard to think that what all this could be building up to is what tyler said he could tell us in spring 2019,,,

title: december fic advent 2018
body:
the december fic advent 2018 is over! thank you everyone that sent in prompts, that left me comments of kudos or kind words of encouragement through these last 25 days; they’ve all been greatly appreciated, and i’ve had so much fun being able to post each fic everyday !!

so here is a masterpost of all 25 fics if you haven’t had time to read them, or perhaps to catch up, but before you go ahead and read them, i just wanna bring your attention to an important cause!! 

the main purpose of this fic fest aside from fun, festive fics, was the lovely cause behind @phandomgives which is an amazing charity that i have decided to give to - £1 for every fic posted this month (plus gift aid).

so in celebration of me actually managing to finish all 25 fics in time for christmas, i’d urge you to donate what you can - and if you’re unable to donate, which is totally understandable, then perhaps consider reblogging this post for others to see, in hopes of getting more people to donate to such a wonderful cause :)

so thank you again to everyone that has been kind enough to read my fics, and wishing everyone a merry christmas and a happy holidays where ever you may be!!

many thanks,
emmy <3

december 1st: make a mess

december 2nd: yuna’s theme

december 3rd: cobbled paths and grey skies

december 4th: magic in the form of white coated chemicals

december 5th: puppy eyes

december 6th: chocolate milkshakes and christmas traditions

december 7th: frosted f*cks

december 8th: up on these mountains

december 9th: you worry me something stupid

december 10th: the brain inside my muddled head

december 11th: sweet when sick

december 12th: win a prize every time

december 13th: turkey for two

december 14th: to tokyo

december 15th: what lies beneath the waters

december 16th: letters under my window

december 17th: pick up the pieces

december 18th: friend for life

december 19th: sucker punch

december 20th: kiss it better

december 21st: love is forever

december 22nd: a mothers secrets

december 23rd: when life isn’t always as brilliant

december 24th: for my love

december 25th: merry christmas, baby

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester
